K10sf265_sc:2: Wal_2 ye kecid bhikṣavaḥ samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṁ pravrajaṁti sarve te caturṇāṁ āryasatyānāṁ jñānāya /
K10sf265_sc:4: Wal_4 duḥkham āryasatyasya duḥkhasamudayasya duḥkhanirodhasya duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyasya jñānāya /
K10sf265_sc:5: Wal_5 tasmāt tarhi caturṇām āryasatyānām anabhisamitānām abhisamayāya atimātraṁ tīvracchando vyāyāmaś cotsudhiś cāprativāṇiś ca smṛtyā saṁprajanyena ca yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
K10sf265_sc:7: Wal_7 duḥkham āryasatyasya duḥkhasamudayasya duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyasya iti /
K10sf265_sc:8: Wal_8 … o … ai … r … satya sūtraṁ samāptaḥ /
